title: Chat Service Problems
body: Im having issues login into chat when i connect to my account my friend has the same problem. Anyone else has the same problem... knows how to fix it?

replies.body: There's currently a server issue that's causing some problems with chat.  Updates will continue to be provided on the [service status](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#euw) page.  Hopefully, this will get resolved in no time and get you back into chatting with your friend!
Got the same issue, i tried changing dates, restarting client and pc, did the service.msc thing. Nothing works
